verses.verse: Go <S%G33>to<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>, ye rich <S%G4145>men<s%>, <S%G2799>weep<s%> and <S%G3649>howl<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5004>miseries<s%> that shall come <S%G1904>upon<s%> you.
<S%G5216>Your<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> are <S%G4595>corrupted<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1096>are<s%> <S%G4598>motheaten<s%>.

<S%G5216>Your<s%> <S%G5557>gold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G696>silver<s%> is <S%G2728>cankered<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2447>rust<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> a <S%G3142>witness<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>. Ye have heaped treasure <S%G2343>together<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>.

<S%G2400>Behold<s%>, the <S%G3408>hire<s%> of the <S%G2040>labourers<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> have reaped <S%G270>down<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5561>fields<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> kept back by <S%G650>fraud<s%>, <S%G2896>crieth<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G995>cries<s%> of them which have <S%G2325>reaped<s%> are <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3775>ears<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G4519>sabaoth<s%>.

Ye have lived in <S%G5171>pleasure<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> been <S%G4684>wanton<s%>; ye have <S%G5142>nourished<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4967>slaughter<s%>.
Ye have <S%G2613>condemned<s%> and <S%G5407>killed<s%> the <S%G1342>just<s%>; and he <S%G498>doth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G498>resist<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.

Be <S%G3114>patient<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2193>unto<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>. <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, the <S%G1092>husbandman<s%> <S%G1551>waiteth<s%> for the <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, and hath long <S%G3114>patience<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G302><s%> he <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G4406>early<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3797>latter<s%> <S%G5205>rain<s%>. Be: or, Be long patient, or, Suffer with long patience

<S%G3114>Be<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3114>patient<s%>; <S%G4741>stablish<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> draweth <S%G1448>nigh<s%>.

<S%G4727>Grudge<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> one against <S%G2596>another<s%> <S%G240><s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%> ye be <S%G2632>condemned<s%>: <S%G2400>behold<s%>, the <S%G2923>judge<s%> <S%G2476>standeth<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%>. Grudge not: or, Groan, or, Grieve not

<S%G2983>Take<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, for an <S%G5262>example<s%> of suffering <S%G2552>affliction<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3115>patience<s%>.

<S%G2400>Behold<s%>, we count them <S%G3106>happy<s%> which <S%G5278>endure<s%>. Ye have <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G5281>patience<s%> of <S%G2492>Job<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G1492>seen<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>; <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> very <S%G4184>pitiful<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of tender <S%G3629>mercy<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4253>above<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G3383>neither<s%> by <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G3383>neither<s%> by the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G3383>neither<s%> by <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3727>oath<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2277>let<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3483>yea<s%> <S%G2277>be<s%> <S%G3483>yea<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> your <S%G3756>nay<s%>, <S%G3756>nay<s%>; <S%G3363>lest<s%> ye <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5272>condemnation<s%>.

<S%G2553>Is<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2553>afflicted<s%>? let him <S%G4336>pray<s%>. <S%G2114>Is<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2114>merry<s%>? let him sing <S%G5567>psalms<s%>.

<S%G770>Is<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G770>sick<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>? let him <S%G4341>call<s%> for the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> let them <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G218>anointing<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> with <S%G1637>oil<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G2171>prayer<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> shall <S%G4982>save<s%> the <S%G2577>sick<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall <S%G1453>raise<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1453>up<s%>; and <S%G2579>if<s%> he <S%G5600>have<s%> <S%G4160>committed<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>, they shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1843>Confess<s%> your <S%G3900>faults<s%> one to <S%G240>another<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2172>pray<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G240>another<s%>, <S%G3704>that<s%> ye may be <S%G2390>healed<s%>. The effectual <S%G1754>fervent<s%> <S%G1162>prayer<s%> of a righteous <S%G1342>man<s%> <S%G2480>availeth<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%>.

<S%G2243>Elias<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> subject to like passions <S%G3663>as<s%> we <S%G2254>are<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G4335>earnestly<s%> that it <S%G1026>might<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1026>rain<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G1026>rained<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> by the space of <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G1763>years<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%>. subject: of the same nature, that is, a fellow mortal earnestly: or, in his prayer

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G5205>rain<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> brought <S%G985>forth<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%>.

<S%G80>Brethren<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> do <S%G4105>err<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G1994>convert<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>;

<S%G1097>Let<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> he which <S%G1994>converteth<s%> the <S%G268>sinner<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G4106>error<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> shall <S%G4982>save<s%> a <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G2572>hide<s%> a <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%>.
